for_sales.sales_text:
"Katie Morag" a Cornish Crabber 22, designed by Roger Dongray, no. 32, built 2002. She is offered for sale including trailer and many extras. She is well maintained, in an excellent condition and ready to sail away.

LOA 8.23m
LOD 6.71m
Beam 2.51m
Draft 0.71m steel centre plate 5’
Displacement 2,023kg
Hull GRP displacement

Specification

Light cream/red two tone GRP hull with cream boottop, coachroof and decks. Teak trim/strakes, red antifouling and off-white boottop.
Danforth anchor with chain and warp
Fire extinguisher
Clock and Barometer
4 x fenders
Lifebelt and light
Mainsail cover
Full overall laid-up cover
2/3 length tent cover
Bilge pump
Boarding ladder
Plastimo Neptune gas burner and grill stove. Gas bottle in separate deck locker.
Stainless steel sink.
New 50L plastimo flexi water tank.
Chart and dinning tables
Cabin lights
Jabsco sea toilet
Sunto Compass
Garmin 129 GPS with remote on-deck readout
Icom DSC/VHF radio.
Airmar in-hull adjustable angle transducer with on deck readout
Digital Yacht AIS AIT2000 Transponder (Class B)
Merlin M-Power 20 battery adaptive charger
Windex 15 wind indicator
Raymarine removable autopilot cockpit tiller
Burgundy sail cover
White overall lay-up cover
Burgundy tent cover (new 2014)
Rigging High peaked gaff cutter with Sikkens type coated spruce mast and spars

Sails

Jib Dark tan on Harken furler.
Staysail Dark tan replaced Jan 2015, on Harken furler.
Mainsail - white

Engine 2002 Yanmar 1GM10 inboard diesel engine.  

Last annual full service completed November 2017.

Trailer 2002 galvanised braked Bramber 4-wheel road trailer with spare tyre.
